1.content: Okay let's get started. First do you wanna fatten the main characters, their peers, a member of their families, or another supporting adult?
1.title: Let's get started

11.content:
The main cast then, okay but who?

Tino: The sarcastic fraidy-cat who questions his mother's strange cooking.
Carver: The African-American shoe-lover who aims to be one of the cool/popular kids.
Tish: The brainy vegetarian from a foreign country.
Lor: The Scottish jock with 14 brothers and more teeth than braincells.
11.title: The main characters

111.content: So does he gain weight?
111.title: Tino.

choices: Toni thinks Tish would look HOT FATTER
Tish's mom wants a more suitable daughter
113.title: Tish

12.content:
Alright then who?

Bree and Coby: The cool kids who treat regular people like they don't even exist.
Tomson Oberman: Lor's crush, whome she tries to woe.
Bluke and Frances: The social outcasts involving an already overweight and brainless oaf with less of a clue than Lor and a creepy girl obsessed with pointy things.
If you can think of any others, than go ahead and add. (I can't remember the name of that girl who's usually seen with Percy.)
12.title: The peers

13.content: Okay let's focus on a member of the families of the main characters.
13.title: Their families

131.content:
Ms. Tonitini: Tino's mom with a strange taste of health cooking.
Dixon: Ms. Tonitini's boyfriend, who shares a particular interest with each of the mains.
131.title: Tino's Mom and Dixon

choices: She abandons her health obsession for more fattening dishes.
She gets into an eating contest with someone.
1311.title: Tino's Mom

choices: She gradually gains weight by the minute
13113.content:
OK, FROM THESE CHOICES:

How does she gain?
13113.title: Other.

choices: Tino's mom decides to cook him fattening dishes
he becomes ravenously hungry, and when he eats, he gets fatter
he gradually gains weight BY THE MINUTE
1312.title: Dixon

132.content:
Carver's unnamed parents, eh? Good thinking.

which one?

or do ya wanna have both
132.title: The Descartes (Carver)

14.content:
Another supporting adult? Okay then.

Mrs. Duwong: The pregnent owner of Helpers Helping the Helpless. (Man, how long has she been expecting?)
Coach Colson: The school PE teacher.
14.title: Supporting adults

info.brief_description: Make your favorite characters from the Weekenders bloated.
info.description:
The characters from the Weekenders are having problems with their waistlines.

This is suppose to be a weight gain story, so:
-no inflation,
-no water logging,
-and good god, no fruit tf.

Other than that, go nuts. Make your favorite characters grow out.
1 last thing: don't make your paragraphs too big, to make it easier to catch up.

Use this link to help ya make them more into character. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Weekenders
